name: Junk Diver
description:
It is 2053, the Earth is polluted and it needs you! Join the crew of Yellouwulf and dive into the deeps of the ocean in order to find and collect all containers with toxic waste.  Be aware of your oxygen amount in your journey of saving the ocean ecosystem.

Features:

Oxygen meter - keeps you alive

Water streams - can get you up without using the oxygen to elevate the submarine

Radar - helps you to detect uncollected trash
